title: Saag gosht (lamb and spinach curry) with chapatis
description: Slow-cooked lamb spiced with cumin, coriander, fenugreek and garam masala makes a fragrant curry. The chapatis are simple to make and freeze well.
ingredients: 1kg/2lb 4oz boneless leg of lamb, cut into large chunks
100g/3½oz fresh fenugreek (methi), or a handful of dried leaves
500g/1lb 2oz gold chakki flour, or mix of 250g/9oz plain flour and 250g/9oz stoneground wholemeal flour, plus extra for dusting, for the chapatis
